description: en- +‎ -crypt, from Ancient Greek κρυπτός (kruptós, literally “hidden, concealed, private, secret”).

verbs.description: encrypt (third-person singular simple present encrypts, present participle encrypting, simple past and past participle encrypted)

entries.meaning: To conceal information by means of a code or cipher.
examples: All messages on this platform are doubly encrypted to increase security.
